attributes.action: Withdraw the United Kingdom from the European Union (EU)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom has been taken for a ride for far too long by a minority of Pro-European politicians who are only intersted in personal financial gain, and not what the British people want.

It is therefore that I have now started a petition in the hope that the current prime minister may take note of what the British people want.
